songs.title: Hate That I Love You (Spanglish Version)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro: Rihanna]
Yeah
Yeah, yeah
That's how much I love you
That's how much I need you

[Verse 1: Rihanna & David Bisbal]
And I can't stand you
Must everything you do make me wanna smile
Can I not like you for awhile? (No)
Tú me dejas
Te enfadas y después me vuelves a besar
Y así me haces olvidar (Estoy molesto...)
Y no me acuerdo de por qué
But I hate it...
You know exactly what to do
So that I can't stay mad at you
For too long, that's wrong
But I hate it
Nadie me calma como tú
Y me doy cuenta que mi única verdad
Es que odio amarte tanto

[Chorus: Rihanna]
And I hate how much I love you, boy
I can't stand how much I need you
And I hate how much I love you, boy
But I just can't let you go
And I hate that I love you so (oh)

[Verse 2: Rihanna & David Bisbal]
Tú sabes el poder que tienes sobre mi
Y nadie más me hace reir
Said it's not fair
How you take advantage of the fact
That I...
Love you beyond the reason why
And it just ain't right

[Chorus: David Bisbal]
Y es que odio amarte tanto amor
Saber que te necesito
Y es que odio amarte tanto amor
No puedo vivir sin ti
Pero odio quererte así

[Bridge: Rihanna & David Bisbal]
One of these days, maybe your magic won't affect me (hmm)
And your kiss won't make me weak
Pero nadie, nadie más hoy me conoce tanto
Eso es un hechizo que tienes sobre mi

[Chorus: Rihanna & (David Bisbal)]
That's how much I love you (Te necesito)
That's how much I need you (Te quiero tanto)
That's how much I love you (Te necesito)
That's how much I need you (Te quiero tanto)
And I hate that I love you so

[Chorus: Rihanna with David Bisbal Adlibs]
And I hate that I love you so
And I hate how much I love you, boy
I can't stand how much I need you
And I hate how much I love you, boy
But I just can't let you go
And I hate that I love you so

[Outro: Rihanna & Davis Bisbal]
And I hate that I love you so, so
